divs: sighting detailsi spotted an unusual aircraft on thursday, september 6, 2012, approximately 9:45 pm in austin, texas. i was traveling west on the 2222 and had just crossed over the 360 when i spotted the aircraft traveling e\ne. the aircraft was at first was in the distance, flying very close to the hills, and i noticed it was an abnormal size and had strange lights for an airplane, it was also moving extremely slow. as i continued on the 2222 the aircraft flew closer to the 2222 and i realized it was flying extremely low and the slow speed became more apparent. it passed over my car and i observed it was a solid triangular shape with brilliant green and red lights along the outside of the triangle. i cannot recall the exact pattern of the lights. what struck me the most odd, and why i am reporting this, is the triangle shape. it was a solid triangle, with no visible wings. i lost sight of the object because it passed over me, continuing ne and i was heading home, directly west. i am not a ufo believing person, but i this was so unusual and thought to myself, ���i think i just saw a ufo!��� i did some research on military planes and could find nothing to matched what i saw, unless of course it was a secret plane.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around September 6th 2012
Summary: Slow moving, solid triangle (no wings) with bright red and green lights
